Package org.neo4j.kernel.impl.store.format

Enum RecordStorageCapability

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<RecordStorageCapability>
      • org.neo4j.kernel.impl.store.format.RecordStorageCapability
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Comparable<RecordStorageCapability>, Capability
    public enum RecordStorageCapability
extends Enum<RecordStorageCapability>
implements Capability
    A collection of high level capabilities a store can have, should not be more granular than necessary for differentiating different version from one another.

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant Description
      DENSE_NODES
      Store has dense node support
      FLEXIBLE_SCHEMA_STORE
      The schema store can store arbitrary properties of schema elements, such as index configurations.
      GBPTREE_COUNTS_STORE  
      GBPTREE_ID_FILES
      ID files (neostore.xyz.id) are backed by GBPTree, transactional and recoverable.
      INTERNAL_TOKENS
      Tokens can be marked as internal, and internal tokens will not be shown in the product surface, but can still be used, well, internally.
      POINT_PROPERTIES
      Point Geometries are an addition to the format, not a change
      RELATIONSHIP_TYPE_3BYTES
      3 bytes relationship type support
      SCHEMA
      Store has schema support
      SECONDARY_RECORD_UNITS
      Records can spill over into secondary units (another record with a header saying it's a secondary unit to another record).
      TEMPORAL_PROPERTIES
      Temporal types are an addition to the format, not a change

      • SCHEMA

        public static final RecordStorageCapability SCHEMA
        Store has schema support

      • DENSE_NODES

        public static final RecordStorageCapability DENSE_NODES
        Store has dense node support

      • RELATIONSHIP_TYPE_3BYTES

        public static final RecordStorageCapability RELATIONSHIP_TYPE_3BYTES
        3 bytes relationship type support

      • POINT_PROPERTIES

        public static final RecordStorageCapability POINT_PROPERTIES
        Point Geometries are an addition to the format, not a change

      • TEMPORAL_PROPERTIES

        public static final RecordStorageCapability TEMPORAL_PROPERTIES
        Temporal types are an addition to the format, not a change

      • SECONDARY_RECORD_UNITS

        public static final RecordStorageCapability SECONDARY_RECORD_UNITS
        Records can spill over into secondary units (another record with a header saying it's a secondary unit to another record).

      • FLEXIBLE_SCHEMA_STORE

        public static final RecordStorageCapability FLEXIBLE_SCHEMA_STORE
        The schema store can store arbitrary properties of schema elements, such as index configurations.

      • INTERNAL_TOKENS

        public static final RecordStorageCapability INTERNAL_TOKENS
        Tokens can be marked as internal, and internal tokens will not be shown in the product surface, but can still be used, well, internally.

        This has CapabilityType.STORE because it is a format addition, and not a format change per se. We just use a record header bit that was free.

      • GBPTREE_ID_FILES

        public static final RecordStorageCapability GBPTREE_ID_FILES
        ID files (neostore.xyz.id) are backed by GBPTree, transactional and recoverable.

      • GBPTREE_COUNTS_STORE

        public static final RecordStorageCapability GBPTREE_COUNTS_STORE

      • isType

        public boolean isType​(CapabilityType type)
        Specified by:

      • isAdditive

        public boolean isAdditive()
        Whether or not this capability is additive. A capability is additive if data regarding this capability will not change any existing store and therefore not require migration of existing data.
        Specified by:
        isAdditive in interface Capability
        Returns:
        whether or not this capability is additive.
